languages.text: {n}В блеклой речи возникает подобие тревоги.{/n} "То мученики были, что вызвались в объятия Неумирающего Императора отправиться по воле сознательной. Запретив ткачам исполнять долг перед Ним, смертью и династией, ты разрываешь веры нити, которыми Кровавая паутина скрепляет отсеки флагмана".
Ты превратно толкуешь наши обряды, {name}. Я не посмею с тобой спорить, если такова твоя воля. Но я не жалею о содеянном — исполнить знамение было важнее всего

{n}Something resembling alarm creeps into his colourless voice.{/n} "They were martyrs. It was their conscious wish to walk into the Undying Emperor's embrace. Domin'{name}, by disallowing the spinners' duty to Him, death, and the dynasty, you cut the very threads of faith that the Bloodspun Web uses to hold the flagship's bays together."
languages.original_text: {n}В блеклой речи возникает подобие тревоги.{/n} "То мученики были, что вызвались в объятия Неумирающего Императора отправиться по воле сознательной. Запретив ткачам исполнять долг перед Ним, смертью и династией, ты разрываешь веры нити, которыми Кровавая паутина скрепляет отсеки флагмана".

Enim'{name}, by disallowing the weavers' duty to Him, Death, and the dynasty, you cut the very threads of faith that the Bloodspun Web uses to hold the ship's bays together."

Domin'{name}, by disallowing the spinners' duty to Him, death, and the dynasty, you cut the very threads of faith that the Bloodspun Web uses to hold the flagship's bays together."

languages.text: {n}Su voz plana parece mostrar un ápice de algo similar a un tono alarmado.{/n} «Son mártires. Aceptaron conscientemente caminar hacia el abrazo del Emperador Inmortal. Domin'{name}, al prohibir el deber de los tejedores hacia Él, la muerte y la dinastía, corta los mismos hilos de la fe que la Red Sanguinolenta usa para mantener unidas a las bahías de la nave insignia».
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling alarm creeps into his colourless voice.{/n} "They were martyrs. It was their conscious wish to walk into the Undying Emperor's embrace. Domin'{name}, by disallowing the spinners' duty to Him, death, and the dynasty, you cut the very threads of faith that the Bloodspun Web uses to hold the flagship's bays together."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su voz plana parece mostrar un ápice de algo similar a un tono alarmado.{/n} «Son mártires. Aceptaron conscientemente caminar hacia el abrazo del Emperador Inmortal. Domin'{name}, al prohibir el deber de los tejedores hacia Él, la muerte y la dinastía, corta los mismos hilos de la fe que la Red Sanguinolenta usa para mantener unidas a las bahías de la nave insignia».

languages.text: {n}その何の感情もない声に、警戒心に似たものが忍び寄る。{/n}「彼らは殉教者だった。腕に抱かれることが、彼らの意識的な願いだったのだ。ドミン・{name}、神と死、そして王朝に対する紡績工の務めを認めないせいで、あなたは信仰の糸を断ち切り、ブラッドスパン・ウェブが旗艦のベイを繋ぎ止めていたものがなくなった」
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling alarm creeps into his colourless voice.{/n} "They were martyrs. It was their conscious wish to walk into the Undying Emperor's embrace. Domin'{name}, by disallowing the spinners' duty to Him, death, and the dynasty, you cut the very threads of faith that the Bloodspun Web uses to hold the flagship's bays together."

traits.locale_text: {n}その何の感情もない声に、警戒心に似たものが忍び寄る。{/n}「彼らは殉教者だった。腕に抱かれることが、彼らの意識的な願いだったのだ。エニム・{name}、神と死、そして王朝に対するウィーヴァーの務めを認めないせいで、あなたは信仰の糸を断ち切り、ブラッドスパン・ウェブが旗艦のベイを繋ぎ止めていたものがなくなった」

languages.text: {n}他毫无生气的声音中浮现出某种类似于惊恐的感情。{/n}“那些人都是殉道者。他们出于自己的意愿，走向了不死帝皇的怀抱，秘者{name}。您禁止织网者对神皇、死亡与王朝履行责任，就相当于切断了织血罗网的信仰之线，这艘旗舰的众多甲板也会变得四分五裂。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling alarm creeps into his colourless voice.{/n} "They were martyrs. It was their conscious wish to walk into the Undying Emperor's embrace. Domin'{name}, by disallowing the spinners' duty to Him, death, and the dynasty, you cut the very threads of faith that the Bloodspun Web uses to hold the flagship's bays together."

traits.locale_text: {n}他毫无生气的声音中浮现出某种类似于惊恐的感情。{/n}“那些人都是殉道者。他们出于自己的意愿，走向了不死帝皇的怀抱，秘者{name}。您禁止织网者对神皇、死亡与王朝履行责任，就相当于切断了织血罗网的信仰之线，这艘旗舰的众多甲板也会变得四分五裂。”

languages.text: {n}In seine farblose Stimme kriecht etwas, was fast nach Beunruhigung klingt.{/n} "Sie waren Märtyrer. Es war ihr bewusster Wunsch, in die Umarmung des Todlosen Imperators zu schreiten. Domin'{name}, indem Ihr den Spinnern nicht gestattet, ihre Pflicht ihm, dem Tod und der Dynastie gegenüber zu erfüllen, durchtrennt Ihr die Fäden des Glaubens, mit denen das Blutgesponnene Netz die Module des Flaggschiffs zusammenhält."
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling alarm creeps into his colourless voice.{/n} "They were martyrs. It was their conscious wish to walk into the Undying Emperor's embrace. Domin'{name}, by disallowing the spinners' duty to Him, death, and the dynasty, you cut the very threads of faith that the Bloodspun Web uses to hold the flagship's bays together."

traits.locale_text: {n}In seine farblose Stimme kriecht etwas, was fast nach Beunruhigung klingt.{/n} "Sie waren Märtyrer. Es war ihr bewusster Wunsch, in die Umarmung des Todlosen Imperators zu schreiten. Domin'{name}, indem Ihr den Spinnern nicht gestattet, ihre Pflicht ihm, dem Tod und der Dynastie gegenüber zu erfüllen, durchtrennt Ihr die Fäden des Glaubens, mit denen das Blutgesponnene Netz die Module des Flaggschiffs zusammenhält."

languages.text: {n}Un semblant d'inquiétude s'insinue dans sa voix monocorde.{/n} « Les victimes étaient des martyres. C'est en toute connaissance de cause qu'elles se sont portées volontaires pour rejoindre le giron de l'Empereur éternel. Domin'{name}, en empêchant les tisseurs de remplir leur devoir envers Lui, la mort et la dynastie, vous tranchez les liens de la foi par laquelle la Toile de Sang assure la cohésion au sein du vaisseau amiral. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling alarm creeps into his colourless voice.{/n} "They were martyrs. It was their conscious wish to walk into the Undying Emperor's embrace. Domin'{name}, by disallowing the spinners' duty to Him, death, and the dynasty, you cut the very threads of faith that the Bloodspun Web uses to hold the flagship's bays together."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un semblant d'inquiétude s'insinue dans sa voix monocorde.{/n} « Les victimes étaient des martyres. C'est en toute connaissance de cause qu'elles se sont portées volontaires pour rejoindre le giron de l'Empereur éternel. Domin'{name}, en empêchant les tisseurs de remplir leur devoir envers Lui, la mort et la dynastie, vous tranchez les liens de la foi par laquelle la Toile de Sang assure la cohésion au sein du vaisseau amiral. »

languages.text: {n}Monoton konuşmasına telaşı andıran bir ses tonu karışmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Onlar şehit oldu. Ölmeyen İmparator'un himayesine doğru ilerlemeyi arzuladıklarında bilinçleri yerindeydi. Domin'{name}, dokurların O'na, ölüme ve hanedanlığa karşı vazifelerine müsaade etmeyerek Kanipi Ağı'nın sancak gemisi bölmelerini bir arada tutmak için faydalandığı inancın her bir ipliğini koparırsınız."
languages.original_text: {n}Something resembling alarm creeps into his colourless voice.{/n} "They were martyrs. It was their conscious wish to walk into the Undying Emperor's embrace. Domin'{name}, by disallowing the spinners' duty to Him, death, and the dynasty, you cut the very threads of faith that the Bloodspun Web uses to hold the flagship's bays together."
